```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)

df <- read_csv('Data/diagnosis_final.csv')

df %>% 
  arrange(desc(NumberOfClaims)) %>%
  head(n = 25) %>%
  ggplot(aes(fct_reorder(CCS_CATEGORY_DESC, NumberOfClaims))) +
  geom_bar()+
  coord_flip()
```
